channel.description: Recent content in Skylark on Music

item.title: Skylark - Wild Flower
item.description:
She’s faced
the hardest times
You could imagine
and many times
Her eyes fought back
the tears
And when
her youthful world
Was about to fail in
each time
Her slender shoulders
wore the weight
Of all her fears
and a sorrow
No one hears
still rings
In midnight silence
in her ears
Let her cry
for she’s a lady
Let her dream
for she’s a child
Let the rain
fall down upon her
She’s a free and
gentle flower
Growing wild
and if by chance
I should hold her
let me hold her
For a time
but if allowed
Just one possession
I would pick her
From the garden
to be mine-

Mm be careful
how you touch her
For she’ll awaken
and sleeps
The only freedom
that she knows
And when you look
into her eyes
You won’t believe
the way she’s always
Paying for a dept
she never owed
And a silent wind
still blows
That only she can hear
and so she goes
Let her cry
for she’s a lady
Let her dream
for she’s a child
Let the rain
fall down upon her
She’s a free
and gentle flower
Growing
wild
Let her cry
for she’s a lady
Let her dream
for she’s a child
Let the rain
fall down upon her
She’s a free
and gentle flower
Growing
wild
She’s a flower
growing wild-
